title: Are you a fan of Bram Stoker’s Dracula novel? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. One of the greatest novels ever written. It has everything in it. It is a medical mystery, a detective novel, a "ghost" story, a history story, a love story, a hint of erotica, an action-adventure story, a horror story, and lastly, just a little bit of a western too.
